source.64e97fa9:
# Read the Data

suicide_filepath = '../input/suicide-rates-overview-1985-to-2016/master.csv'
suicide_data = pd.read_csv(suicide_filepath)
source.a9901ef6:
suicide_data_men = suicide_data[suicide_data.sex == 'male']
suicide_data_women = suicide_data[suicide_data.sex == 'female']

sns.lineplot(suicide_data_men.year, suicide_data_men.suicides_no, ci=None)
sns.lineplot(suicide_data_women.year, suicide_data_women.suicides_no)
plt.legend(["male", 'female'])
plt.show()
source.9969a72d:
suicide_data_age = suicide_data.groupby(["year","age"])["suicides_no", "population"].sum()
suicide_data_reset = suicide_data_age.copy().reset_index()

plt.figure(figsize= (10, 6))
sns.lineplot("year", suicide_data_reset.suicides_no*100/suicide_data_reset.population,
            hue = "age",
            data = suicide_data_reset, linewidth = 2, style= "age", markers=True,
            )
source.0c2d3bc4:
suicide_data_generation = suicide_data.groupby(["year", "generation"])["suicides_no", "population" ].sum()
suicide_data_generation_reset = suicide_data_generation.copy().reset_index()

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
sns.lineplot("year", suicide_data_generation_reset.suicides_no*100/suicide_data_generation_reset.population,
             hue = "generation",
             
             data = suicide_data_generation_reset, linewidth = 3, style= "generation", markers=True
             )

source.25efea1f:
suicide_data.replace("Czech Repuclic", "Czechia", inplace=True)
suicide_data.replace("Macau", "Macao", inplace=True)
suicide_data.replace("Republic of Korea", "South Korea", inplace=True)
suicide_data.replace("Saint Vincent and Grenadines", "Saint Vincent and Grenadines", inplace=True)
source.63e1962c:
suicide_data_no_suicide = suicide_data.groupby(["country", "year"])["suicides_no"].sum()
suicide_data_sum = suicide_data_no_suicide.sort_index(ascending=True)[:] * 100

suicide_data_pop = suicide_data.groupby(["country","year"])["population"].sum()
suicide_data_pop_sum = suicide_data_pop.sort_index(ascending=False)[:]

suicide_data_total = suicide_data_sum / suicide_data_pop_sum
suicide_data_total.head(10)
source.b3768233: The column, HDI for year, has a missing value of 19456
source.6e9b08a8: GI Generation, aka as the Greatest Generation or WWII Generation, has the highest suicide rate during the 90's.
source.3c75a0e3: From this, the suicide rate of male is three times higher than the female. But, both gender's suicide rate drops on the year 2015. Let's see how the data behaves when we add country and age.
